name: Penguin Contract Killer
description:
Hey !

Here is my submission (unfinished, lack of time... Started only some hours before the end of the jam) for the Mini Jam 13 ! Even the game is not yet finished, you can actually enter in the shop and shoot a lot of penguin ! Shooting the special on give some extras point, but it still a really early prototype.

Sorry if the game is not fun as you could think :( Hope you'll enjoy it though
